Schema Validation Utilities 1.7 API

Schema Validation Utilities

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.opengis.cite.validation
Contains classes for performing or facilitating schema validation.

Schema Validation Utilities

Contains classes for performing or facilitating schema validation. W3C XML Schema, ISO Schematron (ISO 19757-3), and RELAX NG (ISO 19757-2) are supported schema languages.

Related resources

  • XML Schema Part 1: Structures, Second Edition
  • Schematron schema language (ISO 19757-3)
  • RELAX NG (ISO 19757-2)
